author: Simon Difford
description: Long and refreshing with rum character, lemon freshness and tonic water's slightly bitter bite.
name: Entwistle's Error
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
